profiles.bio: I am a skilled professional with nearly two years of experience in IT and two years of experience in financial services. I have contributed to a wide range of technical projects working cross-functionally with customers, engineers, and technical leads to solve complex problems. I have had the privilege to be involved in key roles of projects as a developer, business analyst, and IT consultant. I have additional technical experience learning and building software in Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL through an intense, 5-month coding Bootcamp. I believe my passion for continuously learning and enhancing my technical skills will make me an excellent fit for any technical team.
profiles.tagline: Software Development | Actualize Coding Bootcamp | M.S. in Cybersecurity
